snippet: Apps will let you search many ways, show you reviews from previous customers and even show you last-minute deals for the same day.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column analyzes and compares different hotel booking applications.
lead_paragraph: Apps will let you search many ways, show you reviews from previous customers and even show you last-minute deals for the same day.

headline.main: Finding, Comparing and Booking Rooms From Your Mobile Device
